resources.string: Sound Endless Runner
Settings
First Fragment
Second Fragment
Next
Previous
To go back to menu touch screen with 4 fingers.
Welcome in the sound endless runner game. Swipe to move between menu options. Tap to hear messages again.
Play. Double tap to play the game.
Tracks. Double tap to change number of tracks in game.
Swipe to change number of tracks. Double tap to save and go back to menu.
You already have maximum number of tracks.
You already have minimum number of tracks.
Volume. Double tap to change volume.
Swipe to change volume. Double tap to save and go back to menu.
You already have maximum volume.
You already have minimum volume.
Objects. Double tap to change number of objects appearing per minute.
Swipe to change number of obstacles appearing per minute. Double tap to save and go back to menu.
You already have maximum number of objects.
You already have minimum number of obstacles.
Controls. Double tap to change controls in game.
Swipe to change controls. Double tap to save and go back to menu.
Swipes
Accelerometer
Speech recognition
Tap on sides of screen
Enable stop. Double tap to enable stopping in game.
Disable stop. Double tap to disable stopping in game
Language. Double tap to change language.
Swipe to change language. Double tap to save and go back to menu.
Tutorial. Double tap to start the tutorial.
Exit. Double tap to exit.
